meanings.definition: The condition of having both male and female reproductive organs in the same individual.
meanings.sent1: In some plants, monoecies allow for self-pollination.
meanings.sent2: The biologist studied the monoecies of the flower to understand its reproductive system.
meanings.sent3: The garden was full of monoecies, making it a botanical wonderland.
meanings.sent4: The concept of monoecies in nature is truly fascinating.
meanings.sent5: The monoecies of the plant were clearly visible under the microscope.

meanings.sent1: Monoecies in animals can be advantageous for reproduction.
meanings.sent2: The farmer appreciated the monoecies of the livestock on the farm.
meanings.sent3: The monoecies of the town's population made for interesting family dynamics.
meanings.sent4: The unity within the monoecies of the community was admirable.
meanings.sent5: The monoecies of the species ensured survival in diverse environments.
